headline.main: South Korea's Lotte Says 4 Retail Stores in China Closed Amid Political Tension
headline.print_headline: South Korea's Lotte Says 4 Retail Stores in China Closed Amid Political Tension

lead_paragraph: South Korea's Lotte Group said on Monday four of its retail stores in China were closed after inspections by authorities, as Seoul protests at discriminating action by China after Lotte agreed to provide land for a U.S. missile defense system.
snippet: South Korea's Lotte Group said on Monday four of its retail stores in China were closed after inspections by authorities, as Seoul protests at discriminating action by China after Lotte agreed to provide land for a U.S. missile defense system....
